  • Constructor Details

    • ChangeDispenser

      public ChangeDispenser(int commonStock)
      constructs a change dispenser where each denomination is stocked with a common amount
      Parameters:
      commonStock - the common amount stacked to all denominations supported by the change dispenser

    • ChangeDispenser

      public ChangeDispenser(int onePHPStock, int fivePHPStock, int tenPHPStock, int twentyPHPStock, int fiftyPHPStock, int oneHundredPHPStock, int fiveHundredPHPStock)
      constructs a change dispenser where each denomination is stocked with a specified amount
      Parameters:
      onePHPStock - the stock for denomination of 1 PHP
      fivePHPStock - the stock for denomination of 5 PHP
      tenPHPStock - the stock for denomination of 10 PHP
      twentyPHPStock - the stock for denomination of 20 PHP
      fiftyPHPStock - the stock for denomination of 50 PHP
      oneHundredPHPStock - the stock for denomination of 100 PHP
      fiveHundredPHPStock - the stock for denomination of 500 PHP

  • Method Details

    • dispenseChange

      public ArrayList<Denomination> dispenseChange(int changeNeeded)
      Method for dispensing the change in denominations. Before calling this method, please compute for the change needed first (Payment - item price).
      Parameters:
      changeNeeded - the change needed. Must be a positive, nonzero integer
      Returns:
      an empty arraylist if there is insufficient change, otherwise returns the change in denominations

    • StockChange

      public void StockChange()
      stocks a specified denomination
